name: Gone Crabbin'
description:
Crabby Islands museum is EMPTY! That means it's your job to fill it with crabs!

WASD/ArrowKeys/Joystick  to move
E / B (xbox) key to interact

Walk onto the boat to drive it!

Interact with a aquarium tank to see the details of any crabs you've caught/need to catch!

Made for the Weekly Game Jam 162 - Crabs

Credits:

Crab Font https://www.dafont.com/junkohanhero.d1293
DoTween
Music used: AnaCaptainslogue - Noir Et Blanc Vie
